title: Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog Official Soundtrack
description:
This is the Soundtrack for Joss Whedon&#039;s series, "Dr. Horrible&#039;s Sing-Along Blog," downloaded directly from iTunes.

They are iTunes Plus files, so they should have no copy-protection.

1.  Horrible Theme - Instrumental
2.  My Freeze Ray - Neil Patrick Harris
3.  Bad Horse Chorus - Jed Whedon, Joss Whedon & Zack Whedon
4.  Caring Hands - Felicia Day
5.  A Man&#039;s Gotta Do - Neil Patrick Harris, Felicia Day & Nathan Fillion
6.  My Eyes - Felicia Day & Neil Patrick Harris
7.  Bad Horse Chorus (Reprise) - Jed Whedon, Joss Whedon & Zack Whedon
8.  Penny&#039;s Song - Felicia Day
9.  Brand New Day - Neil Patrick Harris
10.  So They Say - Ensemble
11.  Everyone&#039;s A Hero - Nathan Fillion
12.  Slipping - Neil Patrick Harris
13.  Everything You Ever - Neil Patrick Harris
14.  Horrible Credits - Instrumental

Sorry if the track list has any errors in it--I promise the actual files are correct!  I just typed the one above rather quickly.  But that&#039;s what you get for not buying this wonderful soundtrack!  Shame on you!  Actually, I uploaded it because it annoyed me when I couldn&#039;t find it on TPB, so...yeah!  Enjoy!

-Stickboy0042
